author: The Associated Press
title: Live updates: Abramovich superyacht spotted off Montenegro
description: The latest developments on the Russia-Ukraine war:TIVAT, Montenegro — Roman Abramovich’s superyacht Solaris has been spotted in the small Adriatic Sea state of Montenegro.
